data.name: Haulin' Oats Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Straight from the ovens and various studios around the US comes the official soundtrack for Haulin' Oats. It features music by Azucar, El Castor, and Yoshua Shafer.

All proceeds from the soundtrack go back to the artists who made it happen.

data.short_description: Let this deliciously fresh playlist keep you awake on the road. The official soundtrack to Haulin' Oats.
